workstreams.name: Contracting & Closure
workstreams.description: Finalize contracts with legal and financial terms, obtain signatures from all parties, and archive signed agreements. **Critical Gap:** Currently only app services have proper contracts (Digital Services Agreement). Training and interpretation services rely on MOUs which are not legally binding and create revenue recognition and payment risks.
output: Signed contract (Digital Services Agreement for app, Service Agreement for training/interpretation)
**Mandatory:** Purchase Order (PO) from client before service delivery begins
Contract archived in shared drive with proper naming convention
Contract terms logged in CRM for renewal tracking

dependencies.reason: for contract review, terms approval, and PO verification
for contract language and compliance, if applicable
for final approval on significant deals

notes.title: Critical Implementation Requirements
content: **New Policy:** No service delivery without Purchase Order (PO) from client
**Contract Development Needed:** Create standard Service Agreements for:
Interpretation services (hourly/event-based)
Training programs (corporate/public batches)
**Revenue Protection:** Contracts ensure proper invoicing, payment terms, and reduce delayed payment risk
**PO Requirement:** Ensures client's finance department is aware and payment is budgeted

workstreams.content_raw:
**Description:** Issue client invoices, track payments, send reminders. Handle both online and physical invoices. **Cash Basis Accounting:** Revenue only recorded when payment received.

**Invoice Types:** One-time (project-based), Recurring (monthly/quarterly subscriptions)

**Process Flow:** Service complete ‚Üí Invoice generated ‚Üí Send via agreed method ‚Üí Reminders (2 weeks before, on due date) ‚Üí Payment received ‚Üí Bank reconciliation ‚Üí Invoice marked paid ‚Üí Update aging report

**Frequency:** Weekly (issuance/tracking), Daily (payment monitoring)

**Output:** Invoices issued, payment reminders, bank reconciliation, receivables aging report (invoices issued/paid/outstanding/overdue/upcoming)

workstreams.name: Tax Compliance
workstreams.description: File all required taxes. ConnectHear uses **cash basis accounting** - revenue only reported when payment received.
workstreams.content_raw:
**Description:** File all required taxes. ConnectHear uses **cash basis accounting** - revenue only reported when payment received.

**Tax Schedule:**
- **Monthly:** (1) Payroll Tax on payday, (2) Sales Tax 15% on payments received that month, (3) Withholding Tax 4% on vendor payments
- **Quarterly:** Advance Income Tax (AIT) - prediction and prepayment
- **Annual:** Income Tax - final filing reconciling AIT with actual profit

**Frequency:** Daily/Monthly/Quarterly/Annual

**Output:** Tax returns filed on time, payment receipts, calculation documentation, compliance records

**RACI:**

| Role | R | A | C | I |
|------|---|---|---|---|
| Finance Associate (Umaima) | ‚úÖ | | | |

**Critical Understanding - Cash Basis:**
- **Example:** UBL hasn't paid 2023/2024 invoices
- ConnectHear has NOT reported this revenue to FBR (payment not received)
- When UBL pays in 2025, revenue reported in 2025 tax filings
- **Benefit:** Don't pay tax on money not yet received
- **Implication:** Accounts receivable tracking is critical
